title: Dinner at Kanan-chan’s
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Kanan-chaaan, I’m done putting away the ropes.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Wow, already? Thank you, you’re a lifesaver!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>No problem, I’ve gotten better at assisting you, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>You really have! Hey, why don’t you stay for dinner as thanks?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Huh, really?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yup, my parents were planning to cook enough for you as well!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Yay! Will there be fish?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We have some that was caught this morning.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Awesome! I’m gonna have a lot of seconds!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Go right ahead! The more you eat, the bigger and stronger you’ll get~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
